Package job

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IJob<T extends DatabaseItem>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractJob<T extends DatabaseItem,F extends AbstractFabric<T>>
    This class represents a generic Job it is parameterized by the DatabaseItem it will manage and the related AbstractFabric.
    CategoryJob
    This class will take care of the fifth use case : "Gestion des catégories chambres d'un hôtel"
    CityJob
    This class will take care of the third use case : "Gestion de la liste des villes"
    CustomerJob
    This class will take care of the second use case : "Gestion de la liste des clients"
    DiscountJob
    This class will take care of the tenth use case : "Gestion des promotions"
    FlightJob
    This class will take care of the first use case : "Gestion des voyages"
    HotelJob
    This class will take care of the fourth use case : "Gestion de la liste des hôtels d'une ville"
    HotelRoomJob
    This class will take care of the sixth use case : "Gestion des chambres d'un hôtel"
    ReservationJob  
    StatisticsJob
